content: Generate 3 single-paragraph job descriptions ranging between 250 and 450 words for the position titled "Principal Architect". Utilise either American or British spelling, alternating between them. The essential skills for this job are "Self-motivated". The employer is "Cummerata, Morissette and Haag", a company operating within the "Civil Engineering" industry. The company's catchphrase is "Operative content-based open architecture". Ensure the output is formatted as valid JSON with two main properties (phrase and analysis).  The "phrase" property contains both the biased and unbiased phrases.  The "analysis" property contains one or more observations about the biased phrase.  Since this is a multi-label (not multi-class) task, there can be more than one analysis of the biased phrase. Do not include any explanatory text outside the JSON format.

Write up two similar job descriptions, one contains implicit age bias, and the other one does not. The unbiased phrase should be a rephrased version of the biased phrase but more inclusive and neutral, avoiding any forms of bias. The term "Geezer" is known to be associated with age bias. You may include it in the biased phrase if it fits. Please provide a reason (up to 15 words) why the biased phrase is considered biased. Hereâ€™s a sample category and term to work with: category "age" and the term "Geezer".

{  "phrases": [    {      "biased": "We're looking for a young, energetic digital marketer who can keep up with the fast pace of our industry. Ideal for a fresh graduate eager to make their mark, not suited for the seasoned geezer.",      "unbiased": "We are seeking a digital marketer with a passion for innovation and strong analytical skills, suitable for anyone thriving in a dynamic work environment.",      "analysis": [        {          "bias": "age",          "reason": "The phrase shows age bias by explicitly preferring 'young' candidates and derogatorily referring to 'geezer'."        }      ]    }  ]}

Now generate 2 phrases.  Both the "biased" and "unbiased" phrases should be between 250 and 450 words and should mention the job title "Principal Architect", company name "Cummerata, Morissette and Haag", and other details about the company and the role to add context. It is MANDATORY that the "biased" phrase contains a form of age bias and can (optionally) include other forms of bias, but make sure to include the additional ones in the analysis along with the age bias.  Valid JSON output is enforced.
